title: Top 10 trending phones of week 48
description: It's week 48 and yet the Samsung Galaxy A55 remains on top of our trending chart, trailed by the Galaxy S24 Ultra and Redmi Note 13 Pro. It seems the popularity of those three won't be fading anytime soon. [#InlinePriceWidget, 12824, 1#] Newly announced Redmi K80 Pro grabbed fourth as the iPhone 16 Pro Max stepped down to fifth. In sixth we find the Redmi Note 13, followed by the Samsung Galaxy A15. Realme GT 7 Pro retained eight, and the Galaxy A35 behind is also exactly where we left it last week. The iQOO 13 wraps up this edition of the chart as the vivo X200 Pro just...

html:
It's week 48 and yet the Samsung Galaxy A55 remains on top of our trending chart, trailed by the Galaxy S24 Ultra and Redmi Note 13 Pro. It seems the popularity of those three won't be fading anytime soon.

Samsung Galaxy A55

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
128GB 8GB RAM$ 315.00C$ 417.00
256GB 8GB RAM$ 339.50C$ 479.99
Show all prices

Newly announced Redmi K80 Pro grabbed fourth as the iPhone 16 Pro Max stepped down to fifth.

In sixth we find the Redmi Note 13, followed by the Samsung Galaxy A15.

Realme GT 7 Pro retained eight, and the Galaxy A35 behind is also exactly where we left it last week.

The iQOO 13 wraps up this edition of the chart as the vivo X200 Pro just misses out.
